[00:00.00]SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK (Acoustic Remix) - Joji
[00:06.63]Composed by：George Miller
[00:13.27]I don't want a friend
[00:16.47]I want my life in two
[00:23.84]Waiting to get there
[00:29.38]Waiting for you
[00:32.88]Waiting for you
[00:39.65]When I'm around slow dancing in the dark
[00:46.35]Don't follow me you'll end up in my arms
[00:51.38]You done made up your mind
[00:54.44]You done made up your mind
[01:04.78]Give me reasons we should be complete
[01:11.04]You should be with him I can't compete
[01:16.52]You looked at me like I was someone else
[01:24.17]Can't you see
[01:31.58]I don't wanna slow dance
[01:36.99]In the dark
[01:44.49]Dark
[01:54.14]When you gotta run
[01:57.45]Just hear my voice in you
[02:04.62]Shutting me out
[02:09.66]Doing so great
[02:20.30]When I'm around slow dancing in the dark
[02:26.30]Don't follow me you'll end up in my arms
[02:31.70]You done made up your mind
[02:34.70]You done made up your mind
[02:40.63]Can't you see
[02:46.78]I don't wanna slow dance
[02:52.71]In the dark
[03:00.17]Dark
[03:04.82]In the dark
[03:11.34]In the dark
[03:18.36]Dark

[ti:SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK (Acoustic Remix)]
[ar:Joji]
[al:SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK (Acoustic Remix)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:06.63]//
[00:13.27]我不想要朋友
[00:16.47]我希望我的人生一分为二
[00:23.84]等待着抵达终点
[00:29.38]等你
[00:32.88]等你
[00:39.65]当我在你身边在黑暗中翩翩起舞
[00:46.35]别跟着我你会投入我的怀抱
[00:51.38]你已经下定决心
[00:54.44]你已经下定决心
[01:04.78]给我理由我们应该天长地久
[01:11.04]你应该和他在一起我比不了
[01:16.52]你看我的眼神就好像我是别人
[01:24.17]你不明白吗
[01:31.58]我不想慢舞
[01:36.99]在黑暗中
[01:44.49]黑暗
[01:54.14]当你必须逃走时
[01:57.45]听听我的声音
[02:04.62]将我拒之门外
[02:09.66]做得很好
[02:20.30]当我在你身边在黑暗中翩翩起舞
[02:26.30]别跟着我你会投入我的怀抱
[02:31.70]你已经下定决心
[02:34.70]你已经下定决心

[02:46.78]我不想慢舞
[02:52.71]在黑暗中
